description: An agent-based model of an epidemic in a city, with agents representing persons in the city that can move, interact and potentially spread a disease.

behaviors.name: move
behaviors.description: Simulate the movement of people in the city.
behaviors.algorithm: Random walk or based on predefined paths

behaviors.name: interact
behaviors.description: People come into contact with each other, potentially spreading the disease.
behaviors.algorithm: Interaction occurs when two people are in the same location. If one person is infected and the other is not immune, there is a chance the other person becomes infected.

behaviors.name: recover
behaviors.description: Infected people can recover over time.
behaviors.algorithm: After a certain time being infected, a person has a chance to recover and become immune.

behaviors.name: die
behaviors.description: Infected people can die from the disease.
behaviors.algorithm: After a certain time being infected, a person has a chance to die.

interactions.name: person_to_person_interaction
interactions.description: This interaction involves person entities coming into contact with each other, potentially spreading the infection.
interactions.effect: If one person is infected and the other is not immune, the second person can become infected.

algorithms.movement_algorithm: Random walk or based on predefined paths
algorithms.interaction_algorithm: Interaction when two people are in the same location. If one person is infected and the other is not immune, there is a chance the other person becomes infected.
algorithms.recovery_algorithm: After a certain time being infected, a person has a chance to recover and become immune.
algorithms.death_algorithm: After a certain time being infected, a person has a chance to die.

files.name: person.py
files.description: Defines the Person entity and its behaviors

files.name: environment.py
files.description: Defines the environment and its properties
